Related repos

  • Scrobbles music playback history from online services
  • scrobble music plays from any platform to Last.fm, ListenBrainz, or Maloja
  • Self-hosted music scrobble database for listening statistics
  • Music discovery for self-hosted music systems
  • Open-source lossless music player for audiophiles
  • Self-hosted Discord music bot
  • Cross-platform note-taking with infinite canvas
